bahasa.deskripsiManajemen: Lahir di Semarang, 26 Desember 1938, meraih Sarjana Hukum dari Fakultas Hukum UI tahun 1967. Melanjutkan studi dengan kursus singkat di Norwegian Shipping Academy, Sanderstolen, Norwegian, dan Seatrade Academy of London, Cambridge, Inggris.

Merupakan Presiden Indonesia kelima yang menjabat sejak 23 Juli 2001 sampai 20 Oktober 2004. Ia merupakan presiden wanita Indonesia pertama dan putri dari presiden Indonesia pertama, Soekarno, yang kemudian mengikuti jejak ayahnya menjadi Presiden Indonesia
Wakil Presiden Komite Olimpiade Indonesia, juga aktif di Yayasan Perguruan Cikini, berperan dalam pengembangan olahraga dan pendidikan.

Pembicara di Lokakarya Majelis Penilai PP PII, betonisasi sertifikat insinyur dan rekam kinerja. Bagian dari pengurus Yayasan Perguruan Cikini, ia mendukung budaya profesional dan ketatnya regulasi keprofesian.

Lahir di Padang 18 Juli 1946, meraih gelar Sarjana Teknik Industri dari Institut Teknologi Bandung. Mengikuti kursus kursus singkat di beberapa Lembaga Pendidikan. Bergerak dalam bidang konstruksi , mendirikan Pembangkit listrik, pabrik transformator daya  dan perkebunan sawit. 
 Beliau pendiri dan ketua Alumni Perguruan Cikini. Dalam bidang profesi anggota Dewan Pembina Assosiasi Kontraktor Indonesia dan Anggota Kehormatan Masyarakat Kelistrikan Nasional.

Lahirkan di Jakarta 10 Maret 1946, lulusan  SR Perguruan Cikini yang kemudian menyelesaikan Pendidikanya di Jurusan Teknik Fisika Institut Teknologi Bandung (ITB).  Selesai dari ITB, Budiono banyak mengerjakan Pembangunan pabrik Migas, Petrokimia,  dan Gedung Tinggi dan kemudiannya  menjabat  sebagai Direktur dan Komisaris dari Perusahaan EPC Engineering, Konsultan, dan non Teknik lainnya,  disamping  aktif sebagai dosen tamu tetap di Jurusan Teknik Fisika ITB dan berbagai Perguruan Tinggi lainnya.Disamping itu Budiono juga aktif di organisasi Persatuan Insinyur Indonesia dan Korps Menwa Indonesia dan pernah menjadi anggota Majelis Permusyawaratan Rakyat (1993-1998) serta Pengurus Organisasi Olahraga Internasional cabang Angkat Besi,Penghargaan yang diperoleh antara lain dari Pemerintah RI, ITB dan Organisasi Olahraga Internasional

Lahir di Jakarta tahun 1944. Meraih gelar dokter dari Fakultas Kedokteran Universitas Pajajaran Bandung tahun 1978. Kemudian bekerja sebagai Pegawai Negri Sipil Departemen Kesehatan Republik Indonesia diperbantukan pada pemerintah DKI Jakarta. Pada tahun 1997 meraih gelar Magister Kesehatan dari Fakultas Kesehatan Masyarakat Universitas Indonesia di Jakarta untuk peminatan Epidemiologi.

Merupakan anggota dari Ikatan Dokter Indonesia (IDI) dan Perhimpunan Dokter Spesialis Rehabilitasi Medis Indonesia (PERDOSRI).Beliau juga mengikuti pendidikan lainnya seperti Child Development and Rehabilitation di Royal Children's Hospital, Melbourn, Australia

Lahir di Madiun pada 13 Juni 1046. Meraih gelar Sarjana Teknik Mesin dari ITB pada tahun 1975. Mendirikan perusahaan engineering dan konstruksi dibidang teknik mesin dan elektro. Sejak tahun 2001 aktif di kepengurusan Yayasan Perguruan Cikini.

english.deskripsiManajemen: Born in Semarang, December 26, 1938, graduated with a Law degree from the Faculty of Law UI in 1967. Continued studies with short courses at the Norwegian Shipping Academy, Sanderstolen, Norway, and the Seatrade Academy of London, Cambridge, England.

The fifth President of Indonesia who served from July 23, 2001, to October 20, 2004. She is the first female president of Indonesia and the daughter of the first President of Indonesia, Soekarno, who later followed in her father's footsteps to become the President of Indonesia.
Vice President of the Indonesian Olympic Committee, also active in the Cikini Educational Foundation, playing a role in the development of sports and education.

The speaker at the Workshop of the Assessors Assembly of the Indonesian Institute of Engineers discussed the certification of engineers and performance recording. As part of the management of the Cikini Educational Foundation, he supports a professional culture and the strictness of professional regulations.

Born in Padang on July 18, 1946, he earned a Bachelor’s degree in Industrial Engineering from the Institut Teknologi Bandung (ITB). He also attended short courses at various educational institutions. His career focused on construction, including establishing power plants, power transformer factories, and oil palm plantations. 
 He is the founder and chairman of the Cikini Educational Foundation Alumni. In his professional capacity, he serves as a member of the Indonesian Contractors Association Board and holds an honorary position in the National Electrical Society.

Ir.Budiono Kartohadiprojo, the former Chairman of the Indonesian Student Regiment Corps (Korps Menwa Indonesia), played a central role in raising awareness of national defense and the defense of the Unitary State of the Republic of Indonesia (NKRI). As the CEO of PT. Era Media Informasi, he is also active in the media industry, demonstrating his contribution to understanding and disseminating information.

Born in Jakarta in 1944, he earned his medical degree from the Faculty of Medicine, Universitas Padjadjaran, Bandung in 1978. Subsequently, he worked as a Civil Servant in the Indonesian Ministry of Health, specifically assigned to the DKI Jakarta government. In 1997, he obtained a Master’s degree in Public Health with a specialization in Epidemiology from the Faculty of Public Health, University of Indonesia, Jakarta.

Member of the Indonesian Medical Association (IDI) and the Indonesian Association of Specialist Doctors in Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation (PERDOSRI). He also received education in Child Development and Rehabilitation at the Royal Children's Hospital, Melbourne, Australia.

Born in Madiun on June 13, 1046, he obtained a Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering from the Institut Teknologi Bandung (ITB) in 1975. He went on to establish an engineering and construction company specializing in mechanical and electrical engineering. Since 2001, he has been actively involved in the management of the Cikini Educational Foundation.
